channel.title: Ancient reborn! [New] [Staff Spots Open]
channel.description:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/801/ancientrebornbannerzps2.png/][IMG]http://img801.imageshack.us/img801/1102/ancientrebornbannerzps2.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
Main Page: [url=http://www.ancientreborn.com]www.ancientreborn.com[/url] Webclient: [URL=http://"play.ancientreborn.com"]http://ancientreborn.site11.com//webclient.htm[/URL] Forums:[URL=http://"forums.ancientreborn.com"]forums.ancientreborn.com[/URL]
Server Content:
-All working Skills -MANY bosses -Working Jad -Comp cape -Torva/virtus/pernix -Rares/chaotic -Active owners -Working forums/homepage -Experienced coders -No lagg -24/7 uptime -Frequent updates -Open staff spot -Great Economy -Webclient/Downloable client -Working minigames -Events (Hns/trivia/random events) -Double xp weekends (We will advice when one its coming) -Working Lottery -Xp Counter -Help Assist 24 hours! -Working Summoning -3 types of donors rank -100% private message -All spellbooks!
AND MUCH MORE!
[SIZE=5]Here i leave you some screens with just SOME of all the things we have.[/SIZE]
HOME AT PEST CONTROL: Some shops, Kuradel (Slayer master), Zamorak mage for rc, and Thieving Stalls ( They are at home so You can thieve while selling things/talking in home)
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/694/home1j.png/][IMG]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/313/home1j.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
[SIZE=5]All Skills fully working (Construction also)!! Also we got Comp cape for those who achieved 99 on all skills :[/SIZE]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/600/new2sb.png/][IMG]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/7014/new2sb.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
[SIZE=5]Working Minigame as pest control, barrows[/SIZE]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/849/adv33.png/][IMG]http://img849.imageshack.us/img849/2204/adv33.png[/img][/URL]
All bosses working! (Nomad,nex,bandos,kalphie queen, sea queen,corp beast,tormented demons,etc)
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/40/new4nn.png/][IMG]http://img40.imageshack.us/img40/4280/new4nn.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
[SIZE=5]Jad working![/SIZE]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/842/new5p.png/][IMG]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/4365/new5p.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
[SIZE=7] Give us a chance and join now, you wont regret!
AR Owners[/SIZE]
